General.Name: Jinan Acetate Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinan Acetate Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of cellulose diacetate, cellulose acetate tows, and other related products in Asia, the United States, Africa, and Europe. Its products are used in cigarette filters, water-based pen refills, diaper absorbing lining, and clothes; and glasses frame and tool handles. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: The Grand Pavilion Commercial Centre, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1208
